flawed_nl_solution:
Marge had 23 - 5 = <<23-5=18>>18 seeds grow into plants.
Rabbits ate 18 / 3 = <<18/3=6.0>>6.0 plants.
There were 18 - 6.0 = <<18-6.0=21.0>>21.0 plants left.
Weeds strangled 21.0 / 3 = <<21.0/3=7.0>>7.0 plants.
She had 21.0 - 7.0 = <<21.0-7.0=14.0>>14.0 plants left.
Marge kept 1 weed, so she ended up with 14.0 + 1 = <<14.0+1=15.0>>15.0 plants.

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12.0, not 21.0. It appears two adjacent digits were swapped.
